1371: Tijs was born in Die lange straet3 in 1371.
1372: Lost father at the age of 1.
Lost father at the age of 1.
1389: Got married to Ghodelde at age 19 in 1389.
Tijs moved to Muurhuysen2.D.3 after marriage.
1390: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Siwa, at age 19.
1392: Had a son with Ghodelde, Ludolphus, at age 21.
1394: Lost son Ludolphus when Ludolphus was 3 years old.
1396: Became caretaker of Siwa at age 26.
1397: Got married a second time to Lutghardis at age 27 in 1397.

1399: Had a daughter with Lutghardis, Marcibilia, at age 28.
